name: Annotate-it
description:
Annotate-it is a collection of items I use to help me explain designs while not being present.

They are notes, descriptions or even technical directions.

So I wanted to share this with anyone else who benefit of the same.


Patch notes:

April 2022

  • Added chips to post-its.
  • Divided post-it emoji and text, because of text issues when wanting to type, the font became big.
  • Cleaned up the Comments and made them scale with text.
  • Moved .base to another page
